body:
This topic is dedicated to monument campers...I luv 'em
uhmm...on topic again.
I was training some defenses for my team today
The most usual defense that you see in Avicus is something like this

1/a lot of guys in a house that hide the monument. Cons of this defense: KS (killsteals), low mobility, hard to get out, easy to hide, you can't see the monument from outside.
leaving the monument without a defense is better than covering the monument like that

So now, my idea of defending is totally diferent (leaving the monument without blocks)
Some of the ones that I did today:
Quintus (Front Left)

Some slabs to stop block spamming rushers


No idea what's the name of the map (Left)


Senex (Right) With a grief ladder and some rushing

Halcyon (Right)

So yeah, What do you think? These are not my tourney defenses, so it can get a lot better, but it's something.
Challenge: Make a defense, take a pic and post it here to see your building imagination :P
